response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds $8,000 to me due to its quality, craftsmanship, and exclusivity. I am confident it will serve you well and bring immense satisfaction.
